PARAMETERS.NAME: name
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The name of the Contact Role.

PARAMETERS.NAME: type
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The type of the Contact Role

PARAMETERS.NAME: posNumber
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The number associated with the Contact Role

PARAMETERS.NAME: posDescription
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The description for the Contact Role

PARAMETERS.NAME: posstart
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The start date of the Contact Role

PARAMETERS.NAME: posend
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The end date of the Contact Role

PARAMETERS.NAME: dateCommenced
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The commencement date of the Contact Role

PARAMETERS.NAME: directManager
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The Direct Manager Flag: set this (to 1) if the role is intended to be used as a manager

PARAMETERS.NAME: managerContactRoleID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: A valid ContactRoleID which this Contact Role reports to

PARAMETERS.NAME: skillGroupIDs
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: A list of valid Skill Group IDs to assign to the Contact Role (comma separated)

DESCRIPTION: Creates a new Contact Role. This API will not try and search for any existing contact role (of the same name), but simply creates a new one.
